attributes.action: Get Real when it comes to the persecution of speeders in Britain.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If speeding is SOOOOO dangerous then how come an individual can buy a vehicle capable of more than twice the speed limit? I ask the Prime Minister to come clean and admit to the public of Great Britain that the GOVERNMENT strategy with regards to speeding was nothing more than a money making exercise at the expensive of the hard working individuals who have been unnecessarily discriminated against, convicted as well as stressed out thanks to a strategy that has had absolutely NO IMPACT on the saving of lives. I would also ask the Prime Minister to explain to the public WHY they are being held 100% liable for their actions on/in vehicles capable of excessive speeds.

rejection.details: Your petition should be a clear call for action  about Government policy. We cannot accept petitions that ask the Prime Minister to agree with opinion.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
